Syntax

UCLASS (MinimalAPI, BlueprintType, ClassGroup="Material Designer",  
       Meta=(DisplayName="Material Designer Layer"))  
class UDMMaterialLayerObject : public UDMMaterialComponent

Remarks

A collection of stages.
